title: Q&A: Leicester City winger Jeffrey Schlupp on the flying Foxes, learning English and earning a pizza from the boss
text:
FIFA 2010   13:40 CET Q&A: Leicester City winger Jeffrey Schlupp on the flying Foxes, learning English and earning a pizza from the boss - www.ghanasoccernet.com Jeffrey Schlupp 
When Leicester City won promotion, it took them a while to adjust to the Premier League. For much of last season, they looked destined for the drop under combustible manager Nigel Pearson. 
But things eventually clicked, and they've continued their form and fluency under new manager Claudio Ranieri this season, currently lying fifth in the table. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
